articles.title: Tesla drastically lowers EV pricing in the US and Europe - Engadget
articles.description: After steadily increasing prices over the past couple of years, Tesla has cut them massively across its lineup in the US and Europe..
articles.content: After steadily increasing prices over the past couple of years, Tesla has cut them drastically across its lineup in the US and Europe, in an apparent bid to boost sales. The least expensive EV, the M… [+1952 chars]
